meanings.definition: The quality or state of being successive.
meanings.sent1: The successiveness of the days passing by quickly made me realize how time flies.
meanings.sent2: The successiveness of the numbers on the calendar helped me keep track of important dates.
meanings.sent3: The successiveness of the rain showers made it seem like the sky was crying on and off.
meanings.sent4: The successiveness of the waves crashing onto the shore was like nature's heartbeat.
meanings.sent5: The successiveness of the footsteps approaching grew louder with each passing second.

meanings.definition: The act or process of following in order.
meanings.sent1: The successiveness of the students entering the classroom was orderly and calm.
meanings.sent2: The successiveness of the cars in the traffic jam made it hard to see an end to the line.
meanings.sent3: The successiveness of the ants marching in a line was both fascinating and amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The successiveness of the dominoes falling one after the other created a mesmerizing pattern.
meanings.sent5: The successiveness of the dancers moving in sync captivated the audience's attention.
